mapper.insert: insert into nft_rarity (nft_id, token_series_id, rarity, antisocial_ape_club, antisocial_ape_club_count, antisocial_ape_club_rarity, skin, skin_count, skin_rarity, mouth, mouth_count, mouth_rarity, eyes, eyes_count, eyes_rarity, head, head_count, head_rarity, neck, neck_count, neck_rarity, earrings, earrings_count, earrings_rarity) VALUES (#{nftId}, #{tokenSeriesId}, #{rarity}, #{antisocialApeClub}, #{antisocialApeClubCount}, #{antisocialApeClubRarity}, #{skin}, #{skinCount}, #{skinRarity}, #{mouth}, #{mouthCount}, #{mouthRarity}, #{eyes}, #{eyesCount}, #{eyesRarity}, #{head}, #{headCount}, #{headRarity}, #{neck}, #{neckCount}, #{neckRarity}, #{earrings}, #{earringsCount}, #{earringsRarity});
mapper.select: select `id`, `nft_id` nftId, `token_series_id` tokenSeriesId, `rarity`, `antisocial_ape_club` antisocialApeClub, `antisocial_ape_club_count` antisocialApeClubCount, `antisocial_ape_club_rarity` antisocialApeClubRarity, `skin`, `skin_count` skinCount, `skin_rarity` skinRarity, `mouth`, `mouth_count` mouthCount, `mouth_rarity` mouthRarity, `eyes`, `eyes_count` eyesCount, `eyes_rarity`, `head`, `head_count` headCount, `head_rarity` headRarity, `neck`, `neck_count` neckCount, `neck_rarity` neckRarity, `earrings`, `earrings_count` earringsCount, `earrings_rarity` earringsRarity from nft_rarity where token_series_id = #{tokenSeriesId}
